name: Eternal Horizon
description:
Eternal Horizon is a first person parkour game developed in a week for the 2018 Unreal Engine Megajam. The goal of the game is to collect a set number of spheres placed across the map in the fastest time possible. It includes horizontal and vertical wallruns, rolling, jumping and grabbing ledges.

The game is very short  but trying to beat your own time and master the mechanics can add to the replayability. That said, I wouldn't suggest downloading it if you can't afford the bandwidth. 

I average around 150fps with a 3.5ghz i5, 12gb of ram and a gtx 1070. 

Known issues:

-Textures pop in on level start often with hitching. This can cause some issues when trying to do a speedrun of the level. I recommend loading the level, quitting or completing it and then immediately restarting the level.
